results.title: Protective effects of apricot kernel oil and metformin against BPA-induced ovarian toxicity in rat models of polycystic ovary syndrome: insights into PI3K/AKT and mitochondrial apoptosis pathways.
results.text_hl: The results demonstrated that AKO, in synergy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, modulated hormone levels, reduced pro-@<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@, and enhanced antioxidant properties.

citations.NLM: Jiao X, Zhang Q, Ye G, Xing F, Xie D, Wang L. Protective effects of apricot kernel oil and metformin against BPA-induced ovarian toxicity in rat models of polycystic ovary syndrome: insights into PI3K/AKT and mitochondrial apoptosis pathways. results.title: Metformin attenuates inflammation and boosts autophagy in the liver and intestine of chronologically aged rats.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Short-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ pretreatment (31 days) in naturally aging rats (29 months old) increased autophagy levels and down-regulated the expression of various pro-@<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ (@GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL-1beta@@@, @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_81687 @@@MMP-9@@@, and @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@) in various intestinal segments and the liver-the expression of @GENE_MAP1LC3A @GENE_362245 @@@LC3II@@@ protein enriched with the increase of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ concentration.

citations.NLM: Kuai Z, Chao X, He Y, Ren W. Metformin attenuates inflammation and boosts autophagy in the liver and intestine of chronologically aged rats. Exp Gerontol. 2023 Nov 15;184():112331. PMID: 37967593
citations.BibTeX: @article{37967593, title={Metformin attenuates inflammation and boosts autophagy in the liver and intestine of chronologically aged rats.}, author={Kuai Z and Chao X and He Y and Ren W}, journal={Exp Gerontol}, volume={184}, pages={112331}}

results.title: Metformin and SARS-CoV-2: mechanistic lessons on air pollution to weather the cytokine/thrombotic storm in COVID-19
results.text_hl: The incorporation of @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ rates, severity and lethality of @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@SARS-CoV-2 infections@@@ as new outcomes of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ usage in elderly populations at risk of developing severe @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@, together with the assessment of bronchial/serological titers of @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ and D-dimers, could provide a novel mechanistic basis for the consideration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a therapeutic strategy against the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ states underlying the gerolavic traits of @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@SARS-CoV-2 infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Menendez JA. Metformin and SARS-CoV-2: mechanistic lessons on air pollution to weather the cytokine/thrombotic storm in COVID-19 Aging (Albany NY). 2020 May 27;12(10):8760-8765. PMID: 32463794
citations.BibTeX: @article{32463794, title={Metformin and SARS-CoV-2: mechanistic lessons on air pollution to weather the cytokine/thrombotic storm in COVID-19}, author={Menendez JA}, journal={Aging (Albany NY)}, volume={12}, number={10}, pages={8760-8765}}

results.title: Gene expression of protein kinase AMP-activated catalytic subunit alpha 1 (PRKAA1), solute carrier family 2 member 1 (SLC2A1) and mechanistic target of rapamycin (MTOR) in metformin-treated type 2 diabetes patients with COVID-19: impact on inflammation markers.
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ therapy, a common treatment for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ patients, has been linked to increased mortality in @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ patients with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D.@@@ However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ medication, has been shown to have anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ properties that may mitigate the @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@cytokine@@@ storm observed in severe @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ cases.

citations.NLM: Petakh P, Kamyshna I, Kamyshnyi A. Gene expression of protein kinase AMP-activated catalytic subunit alpha 1 (PRKAA1), solute carrier family 2 member 1 (SLC2A1) and mechanistic target of rapamycin (MTOR) in metformin-treated type 2 diabetes patients with COVID-19: impact on inflammation markers. Inflammopharmacology. 2023 Sep 29;():. PMID: 37773574
citations.BibTeX: @article{37773574, title={Gene expression of protein kinase AMP-activated catalytic subunit alpha 1 (PRKAA1), solute carrier family 2 member 1 (SLC2A1) and mechanistic target of rapamycin (MTOR) in metformin-treated type 2 diabetes patients with COVID-19: impact on inflammation markers.}, author={Petakh P and Kamyshna I and Kamyshnyi A}, journal={Inflammopharmacology}}

results.title: Nanoparticles of Costus speciosus Ameliorate Diabetes-Induced Structural Changes in Rat Prostate through Mediating the Pro-Inflammatory Cytokines IL 6, IL1beta and TNF-alpha
results.text_hl: Prostatic expression of the mRNA of pro-@<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@, @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL1beta@@@ and @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ was down-regulated in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@- and @SPECIES_49577 @@@C. speciosus@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Bakhshwin D, Faddladdeen KAJ, Ali SS, Alsaggaf SM, Ayuob NN. Nanoparticles of Costus speciosus Ameliorate Diabetes-Induced Structural Changes in Rat Prostate through Mediating the Pro-Inflammatory Cytokines IL 6, IL1beta and TNF-alpha Molecules. 2022 Feb 2;27(3):. PMID: 35164292

results.title: Metformin use and gynecological cancers: A novel treatment option emerging from drug repositioning.
results.text_hl: @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation inhibits mRNA translation and proliferation in @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cells via down-regulation of PI3K/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@Akt@@@/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ pathway. Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreases the production of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, insulin-like growth factor, @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ and @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_7422 @@@vascular endothelial growth factor@@@, and therefore it exerts anti-mitotic, anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and anti-angiogenetic effects.

citations.NLM: Gadducci A, Biglia N, Tana R, Cosio S, Gallo M. Metformin use and gynecological cancers: A novel treatment option emerging from drug repositioning. Crit Rev Oncol Hematol. 2016 Sep;105():73-83. PMID: 27378194

results.title: Metformin alleviates inflammatory response in non-alcoholic steatohepatitis by restraining signal transducer and activator of transcription 3-mediated autophagy inhibition in vitro and in vivo.
results.text_hl: The current results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ activated autophagy and decreased the mRNA expressions of @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@, @GENE_IL1B @GENE_16176 @@@IL-1beta@@@, @GENE_IL6 @GENE_16193 @@@IL-6@@@, and @GENE_TNF @GENE_21926 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ via inhibition of the @GENE_STAT3 @GENE_20848 @@@STAT3@@@ mRNA and protein expression.

citations.NLM: Li YL, Li XQ, Wang YD, Shen C, Zhao CY. Metformin alleviates inflammatory response in non-alcoholic steatohepatitis by restraining signal transducer and activator of transcription 3-mediated autophagy inhibition in vitro and in vivo. results.title: Chemosensitizing effects of metformin on cisplatin- and paclitaxel-resistant ovarian cancer cell lines.
results.text_hl: We found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, in clinical relevant doses, could significantly reduce the mRNA expression of @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ and @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ signaling pathway.

results.title: Metformin inhibits nuclear factor-kappaB activation and inflammatory cytokines expression induced by high glucose via adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase activation in rat glomerular mesangial cells in vitro.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may ameliorate @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ via @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ interaction with critical @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@.
